subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rivals for supremacy on the court, Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic have now become political allies off it in an attempt to take more control over the direction of tennis.
snippet: Rivals for supremacy on the court, Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Novak Djokovic have now become political allies off it in an attempt to take more control over the direction of tennis.
